creditline: Gift of David Laird and Helen Lauritzen Laird
description: dancing figure turned slightly toward PR; figure wears a turquoise kachina mask with feathers and red ears, a white blanket with red and black striped trim, a white skirt with black geometric trim patterns and brown moccasins with white soles; figure holds a bell in PR hand and a pine branch in PL hand

title: Kachina Figure
